column4: can someone help a newbie out... my sound is totaly not working... i get "No volume control GStreamer plugins and/or devices found." when clicking on the volume icon here
i have followed the "Comprehensive Sound Problem Solutions Guide v0.5e" http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=205449  without any luck :S
i get "alsamixer: function snd_ctl_open failed for default: No such device"
